reviews.text: I stayed here with my husband for one afternoon while waiting for a flight out of BRU. We booked ahead at the rate of 42 euros. Check in was very smooth and despite arriving several hours before noon, we were granted access to our room right away. The rooms are extremely small but served our purpose well; we only wanted to sleep and shower after a long flight. The room was a little bit stuffy, but we opened the window for a breeze. If there was air conditioning, we did not find it. The bed was a little hard. The shower was very small but everything was clean and properly functioning. There is no hair dryer but a dispenser of hand soap/shampoo is offered. There is a shuttle that runs to and from the airport, which was very convenient and saved us money, although it only runs at certain times so be sure to check with the front desk. Overall I would describe the Etap as a high end hostel offering

reviews.text: I arrived at about 1am, after a long drive from the UK. Being situated in a business park (near to where my company's Brussels-based colleagues work), access from the R0 (Brussels Ring Road) is easy - come off at the junction for Zaventem Airport, take the A201 motorway towards the centre of Brussels and come off at the first turning (the Etap will be sign-posted from there). The car park (shared with several other hotels) is paying - at the time of my stay, it cost 8 Euros for one night's parking. Once I had found a space, I went into the hotel and was greeted politely. The room served my needs well, being clean and equipped with the basics, and I got a good night's sleep. It was a satisfactory stay overall, but I wish that the parking was a bit cheaper.

reviews.text: Better than a Premiere Class, Cheaper than a Formule 1 (next door). Convenient for airport and with free shuttle bus (unexpected with internet research done beforehand). Also next to an Ibis with a restaurant (relatively expensive, I thought). Had breakfast, which was excellent but expensive at E7.00. Room tidy, simple, separate toilet and shower cubicle from main room. Sink in room bizarrely. General impression was good value.
